amendment.description: At the end of division C (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. Each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) is hereby reduced by 23.6 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 161 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to decrease funding made available by the bill (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) by 23.6 percent to match the President's budget request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 304 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hice (GA) amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 304 (Roll no. 388).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Hice (GA).
